register_saving_for: First tell Piggy what you are saving for...
how_much_it_cost: How much money do you want to save?
price_start_zero_validation: The price can't start with zero!
piggy_offer_some_plans: Let Piggy offer you some plans to reach the goal
final_step: Please register with the following datas
you_have_to_feed: You should feed Piggy to make Piggy happy.
how_much_i_earned: How much money have i saved so far?
piggy_happy: Piggy is so happy to have you!
please_register: It seems, that Piggy didn't find an account for this phone number. Please register first, or check the entered phone number
check_internet: Please check your internet connection, then restart the application
verification_failed: Phone number verification failed. Please try again!
go_back_phone_number_tooltip: Go back to type in another phone number
long_code_error: The validation code is too long
short_code_error: The validation code is too short
demo_over_dialog_content: Piggy reached the end of his teenager age! Stay with us, and save more money, when the live version get released!
if_you_dont_have: If you don't have any PiggyBank, just create one and you can start save money with Piggy
you_can_create: You can create as many boxes as you want, but you can only have 5 active at a time.
selector_explanation: Choose which PiggyBank you want to put money in!
how_much_per_feed_question: How much money do you want to spend on feeding?
ask_about_the_problem: It seems that you need to do better!
no_friend_requests: You do not have new friend request
money_to_your_goal: Euros / Forints You have to collect to reach your goal!
wants_to_double_ask: Do you really want to double?
add_your_children_for_information: Add your children to your partner list to manage their savings!
no_finished_task: You do not have finished task! :(
double_information: The meaning of the Double is that, if you complete a task, you get an extra Piggy Coin, which you can use in any PiggyBanx! Complete your tasks, to finish the saving sooner!
give_the_value_of_piggycoin: Give the value of 1 Piggy Coin
friend_request_sent_already: Friend request already sent to the person!
error_during_accept: Error during the accept of friend request
parent_validate_info: After the parental validation, your PiggyBanx will show up on tha main screen and you can start saving!
you_can_start_saving_in_this: You can start saving in the following PiggyBanx
sure_you_want_to_double: Are you sure that you want to double?
sure_you_want_to_finish: Are you sure that you finished your task
parent_request_info: When he/she accept your request, you are going to see your child savings and you can give him/her tasks
no_parent_info: HI! To create your first PiggyBanx, you need to add one of your parent.
